meanings.definition: A person who publicly criticizes or mocks someone or something through satire or ridicule.
meanings.sent1: The lampooner in the comedy show made fun of the politician's speeches.
meanings.sent2: The famous lampooner wrote hilarious articles poking fun at celebrities.
meanings.sent3: The lampooner at the party had everyone laughing with his clever jokes.
meanings.sent4: The lampooner's sharp wit cut through the pretentiousness of the art world.
meanings.sent5: The lampooner's humor was so sharp, it left a lasting impression on the audience.
